snippet: A journalist was murdered in the troubled southern state of Guerrero, Mexican authorities said Friday, adding to a long list of reporter killings in what is considered one of the world's most dangerous countries for media professionals....

headline.main: Frank Gehry and Daniel Barenboim on Their New Concert Hall in Berlin
headline.print_headline: Frank Gehry and Daniel Barenboim on Their New Concert Hall in Berlin

lead_paragraph: A journalist was murdered in the troubled southern state of Guerrero, Mexican authorities said Friday, adding to a long list of reporter killings in what is considered one of the world's most dangerous countries for media professionals.
